column1: 19:22|It was 7:22 p.m. by the wall clock when he soldered the final connection. Eric estimated a half hour delay before the little generator had taken over

column1: 19:22|BRYCE FENSTON’S GULFSTREAM V executive jet touched down at Heathrow at 7:22 P.M.
column2: and Ruth was standing on the tarmac waiting to greet the bank’s representative. She had already alerted customs with all the relevant details so that the paperwork could be completed just as soon as Anna returned.|False Impression|Jeffrey Archer
